attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: charge gordon brown and tony blair with treason for handing briton over to brussels with out british citizens permison

rejection.details: It is the role of the police to investigate suspected crimes and pass any evidence they have to the Crown Prosecution Service who decide whether there is a case to answer and whether to take that case to court.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
